definition: paper/treatise/thesis/CL:篇[pian1]/to discuss a paper or thesis (old)
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)

sentences.english: Therefore, the dissertation concentrates on the research of localization in WSNs.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本论文围绕无线传感器网络定位技术展开研究。

sentences.english: They define an "excellent paper" as one that is highly cited by other researchers.
sentences.chinese: 他们把“优秀论文”定义为引用量高的文章。

sentences.english: Big brother says the paper is due tomorrow, or else.
sentences.chinese: 老师说，论文明天应交，否则后果由个人负责。

sentences.english: The feasibility of applying fuzzy mathematics method to appraise manuscript quality is studied. How to apply Method No.
sentences.chinese: 探讨应用模糊数学方法评价论文稿质量的可行性。

sentences.english: In the first part, the author explain the meaning of medium-small investor.
sentences.chinese: 论文第一章首先阐述了投资者和中小投资者的内涵。

sentences.english: He turned to an editorial and began reading it with interest.
sentences.chinese: 他翻到里面的一篇论文，津津有味地读起来。

sentences.english: This thesis introduced the whole processes of the development of the tobacco flavor management information system .
sentences.chinese: 本论文介绍了香精香料管理信息系统开发的全过程。

sentences.english: The thesis emphasizes the materiality of the compensation allocation first.
sentences.chinese: 论文首先强调了薪酬分配的重要性。

sentences.english: Chapter three, is analysis and assessment about the investment risk of construction project.
sentences.chinese: 论文的第二章为工程建设项目投资风险识别。

sentences.english: More scientific papers come out of China than out of any other country but the U.
sentences.chinese: 中国的科学论文产出数量高于除美国以外的任何国家。

sentences.english: Objective:Research Qiwei safflower Shushen powder on the protective effect of liver injury.
sentences.chinese: 本论文研究七味红花殊胜散对肝损伤的保护作用。

sentences.english: The aim of this thesis is to compare and study the differences of phatic language between English and Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 本论文旨在对比研究应酬语在英汉语中的区别。

sentences.english: This paper discussed the practicability of bio-refinery the plant of Lycoris radiate.
sentences.chinese: 本论文探讨了对石蒜属植物的综合生物炼制可行性。

sentences.english: He should have no problem writing that essay.
sentences.chinese: 他写那篇论文决无问题。

sentences.english: EXITO's National China Clays Mining Industry Report-Industry Response|Purpose of Survey|Methodology|Survey Response Rate Demographic Data – New Zealand China Clays Mining Industry…
sentences.chinese: 澳洲论文网提供新西兰与中国粘土采矿业研究报告。

sentences.english: The information-driven sensor selection is simulated in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 论文对信息驱动的节点选择机制进行了仿真。
